category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 11 (Resolution, etc.)
contents: Article 11 (Resolution, etc.) ① Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 92, Paragraph 2 of the Decree, if it is difficult to convene the Review Committee for unavoidable reasons, the Chairman of the Screening Committee shall make a written resolution with the consent of a majority of the members designated in accordance with Article 92, Paragraph 1 of the Decree. can do. Revised September 16, 2022. ② Pursuant to paragraph 1, when making a written decision, the subject of deliberation is limited to the minimum, and two consecutive written decisions cannot be made. ③ In the case of a tie, or if it is deemed necessary to conduct additional factual investigation for individual agenda items proposed, the chairman of the review committee may withhold the decision after collecting the opinions of members present.
